complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Setup Project Repository and Development Environment
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand each setup step into detailed configuration tasks, including environment validation, dependency management, and CI/CD pipeline testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves multiple distinct technical setups (frontend, backend, linting, CI/CD) that require coordination but are standard procedures with clear steps, making it moderately complex.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail each authentication feature including backend configuration, frontend forms, email workflows, route protection, and logout handling with security considerations.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Authentication involves security-sensitive backend and frontend integration, email workflows, and session management, increasing complexity beyond basic setup.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down database setup into environment configuration, table creation, relationship enforcement, security policies, and performance optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Database design requires careful schema planning, security with RLS, encryption, and performance tuning, which adds significant complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand integration tasks to cover authentication, monitoring, data pipelines, error handling, and real-time notifications with dashboard development.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Integration with external APIs and real-time data processing with error resilience and monitoring adds high complexity due to external dependencies and robustness requirements.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail AI components including NLP event detection, ML model development, real-time processing, lead prioritization, and API creation with batch processing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: AI and real-time data processing with complex ML models and pipelines require advanced expertise and careful orchestration, making this highly complex.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand tasks to cover personality analysis, recommendation engine, GPT-4 integration, A/B testing framework, and continuous learning API development.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Combining AI personality analysis, NLP generation, and adaptive learning with testing frameworks involves sophisticated AI and system design challenges.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand CRM features into data modeling, CRUD operations, search/filtering, tagging, and API/reporting development with validation and security.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Core CRM features are standard but require careful data handling, validation, and user interface considerations, resulting in moderate complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail pipeline UI, drag-and-drop, AI-powered transitions, analytics dashboard, and notification/customization systems.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Interactive UI with AI integration and analytics adds complexity beyond basic CRUD, requiring real-time updates and user customization.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand visualization tasks to include data structure design, D3.js rendering, interactivity, filtering, and network analysis with performance optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Graph visualization with interactive features and performance tuning for large datasets involves moderate to high complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail OAuth setup, bidirectional sync mechanisms, real-time updates, conflict resolution, and user interface with error handling.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Two-way sync with real-time updates and conflict management requires careful API integration and state management, increasing complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand AI meeting classification, checklist generation, note automation, follow-up recommendations, and API with scoring and reminders.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: AI-driven meeting features with NLP, automation, and recommendation systems add significant complexity due to AI model integration and user interaction.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Team Management and Collaboration Features
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail team creation, RBAC, shared views, performance dashboards, mentoring, collaborative notes, and notifications.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Team and role management combined with collaboration tools require complex permission handling and real-time synchronization.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand invitation code generation, tracking, registration flow, management UI, analytics, and anti-abuse mechanisms.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Invitation systems involve user flow control and security but are relatively straightforward compared to AI or real-time systems.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail task prioritization, performance prediction, market insights aggregation, NLG summary generation, API, and UI development.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Combining AI prioritization, prediction, NLP generation, and user customization creates a complex AI-driven feature set.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand real-time data collection, KPI calculations, dashboards, alerting, forecasting, API, and visualization components.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Real-time data processing with analytics and alerting requires robust infrastructure and responsive UI, adding moderate complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail feature engineering, XGBoost model training, continuous retraining, explainable AI, A/B testing, API, and UI components.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Advanced ML model development with explainability and continuous deployment involves high technical complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop Predictive Analytics for Sales Forecasting
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand data pipeline, LSTM modeling, ensemble methods, scenario analysis, API, and interactive visualization tasks.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Time series forecasting with advanced ML and scenario modeling requires specialized expertise and complex data workflows.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail NLG engine, multi-channel infrastructure, timing algorithm, response tracking, management API, and admin UI.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Multi-channel communication with AI-generated content and analytics involves integration complexity and real-time considerations.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand speech-to-text, sentiment analysis, suggestion engine, objection handling, API, and UI with post-call analytics.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Real-time audio processing, AI coaching suggestions, and integration with CRM systems require advanced AI and streaming data expertise, making it highly complex.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail centrality measures, community detection, predictive modeling, influence simulations, API, and interactive visualizations.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Advanced graph algorithms and simulations with large datasets require specialized knowledge but are manageable with existing libraries.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop Comprehensive Reporting and Analytics Module
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand data warehouse design, report builder UI, template library, export/distribution system, and interactive dashboard development.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Building flexible reporting with large data volumes and user customization involves moderate complexity in data engineering and UI design.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail multi-source data collection, NLP market intelligence, predictive modeling, anomaly detection, API, and visualization interface.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Market trend analysis combining NLP and predictive models requires integration of diverse data sources and AI techniques, adding moderate complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop AI Ethics and Bias Monitoring System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand fairness metrics, bias detection, explainable AI, ethics review process, monitoring dashboards, and user feedback systems.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Ethics and bias monitoring involves complex statistical analysis, AI interpretability, governance workflows, and continuous improvement, increasing complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Advanced Data Privacy and Security Measures
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Detail encryption infrastructure, MFA and access control, data anonymization, audit logging, compliance automation, and privacy-preserving ML.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Security and privacy require rigorous implementation of encryption, access controls, compliance, and advanced privacy techniques, making it highly complex.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop System Monitoring and Performance Optimization
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand monitoring setup, custom metrics, alerting, query optimization, caching, load balancing, and health dashboard tasks.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Comprehensive system monitoring and optimization involve multiple infrastructure components and performance tuning, resulting in moderate complexity.
